timeline.message: Do not return empty observable in case of error, escalate to handler.

Revert "Do not return empty observable in case of error, escalate to handler."

This reverts commit a5bcafa94ee55bf5c10b72254c52d6ea77904b4c.

Revert "try resetting at onSave"

This reverts commit cf4b0b05824fb6745480f93ffb4f0cb9f1601eaf.

Remove duplicate jhi-alert
There is another jhi-alert component in the child components. Therefore the error messages are shown as duplicates
add error message on connection timeout

timeline.bodyText: it's not really clear what you mean with "Zeitlimit" this is too technical. I would rather translate it to user language.
timeline.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change

                            "connectionTimeout": "Speichern ist fehlgeschlagen. Bitte stelle eine gute Internetverbindung sicher und versuche es nochmal."
